page.title: 07Customs
page.content: {Feast Days } In early Summer each year the annual fete is held in Barlow and Drax, known locally as "The Feast". These have their origins in farm holidays at the end of haymaking and consist largely of sports, competitions and sideshows with stalls, bands and the crowning of the Queen. {Playground Games {Fox and Hounds}is played by dividing the players into two groups. One group "the hounds" chase the other group "the foxes". The game ends when all the foxes are caught. Then they change roles. {British Bulldog}One person is the bulldog and stands in the middle of the playground. He shouts "British Bulldog" and the other players run across the playground while he tries to catch them.
